item.description:
Need to get out and dance, this band rocks to tunes to  top 40's, and if you like to dance this is the place to be on a TGIF night !!

If you want to meet for dinner or just dance include  it in you RSVP, fridays are busy so getting a heads up helps me approximate seating size.

When you come in ask the hostess to point you to Eva's group, after the band starts you are on your own (usually by 9pm) cause I am out there dancing.

This is a huge sports bar so dress is casual and there is no cover charge, food is great and they do seperate checks so there is never a hastle.

 This Meet Up is combined with several others.

Band     Mama Kicks

Starts     9pm- 1am
item.name: Dancing to Live Band" Mama Kicks"
